page.title: 10Recreation
page.content: The village has 2 church halls,a village hall and a Leisuredrome(large hall) which are all well used. Here are some of the village clubs and societies:- Judo, Badminton, Over 60's, Young Farmers, Gadeners' Society, Conservation Society, Civic Society, Play Groups, Dancing Classes, Youth Club, Floral Art, Camera Club, Brownies & Guides, Cubs & Scouts, BMX Club, Cricket Club,Football Club, Clay Pigeon Shooting Club, Ladies' Keep Fit, Popmobility. Hawkinge Primary School Parents Teachers & Friends Association. There is one Public House in the village.There are 2 small play areas for children with swings,slide and roundabouts. A mobile library van attends the village on Monday mornings and Thursday afternoons.
